Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん、ラジルダに来てから、 どこを見て回ったんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hilda, where did you go the last time you were in Razilda?

Entry.JapaneseText: どこって……小さな街だし…… 宿屋、道具屋、武器屋……そんなところかしら。
Entry.EnglishText: Where? Well, it's a small town... Probably the inn, or the general store, or the weapons shop...
